rare.name: TARGET TRACKER
rare.description: For each enemy or ally affected by [Biotic Grenade], gain 5% Attack Speed, up to 25%.

rare.name: QUICK SCOPE
rare.description: Deal 20% more damage to airborne enemies.

epic.name: UNSCOPPED RESOURCES
epic.description: +4 Max Ammo. Unscoped [Rifle] shots have a 60% chance not to consume ammo.

rare.name: DOUBLE DOSAGE
rare.description: Landing a [Sleep Dart] on target affected by [Biotic Grenade] reduces its cooldown by 35%.

epic.name: LETHAL DOSE
epic.description: [Sleep Dart] direct hit deals 100 bonus damage.

epic.name: CLUSTER CORE
epic.description: [Biotic Grenade] cooldown is reduced by Is for each target it hits.

epic.name: TRANQUILIZER
epic.description:
[Sleep Dart] gains:
  • 500% Collision Size
  • 100% Projectile Speed
  • 20% Sleep Duration

rare.name: DASH BOOTS
rare.description: Jumping in mid-air will dash you a short distance.

rare.name: I.V. DRIP
rare.description: While affected by [Biotic Grenade], Ana gains 100 Overhealth.

epic.name: EYE OF HORUS
epic.description: [Nano Boost] can target allies through walls and its range is increased to 60m.

powers.title: NO SCOPE NEEDED
powers.description: Landing unscoped shots with [Biotic Rifle] grants 10% Attack Speed for 2s, stacking up to 3 times.

powers.title: PINPOINT PRESCRIPTION
powers.description: [Biotic Rifle] can now critically hit both allies and enemies.

powers.title: TACTICAL RIFLE
powers.description: While scoped, [Biotic Rifle] will lock-on to allies for guaranteed hits.

powers.title: COMFY CLOUD
powers.description: [Sleep Dart] explodes on contact, hitting targets within 3m, but Sleep has a 50% reduced duration.

powers.title: DREAMY
powers.description: [Sleep Dartl can hit allies, healing 100% of their max Life over 8s instead of putting them to sleep.

powers.title: SLEEP REGIMEN
powers.description:
Gain 50 Health.
When you apply Sleep to an enemy, gain 10 Health, up to 150.

powers.title: HOME REMEDY
powers.description: [Biotic Grenade] grants Overhealth equal to 100% of its healing.

powers.title: TIME OUT
powers.description: [Biotic Grenade] now knocks enemies back and reduces their Move Speed by for 1.5s.

powers.title: VENOMOUS
powers.description: [Biotic Grenade] deals an additional 30 damage over its duration to enemies affected.

powers.title: MY TURN
powers.description: [Nano Boost] also applies to yourself for 50% of its duration.

powers.title: OUR TURN
powers.description: [Nano Boost] also affects other allies in your line of sight, but it has a 50% reduced duration on them.

powers.title: YOUR FULL POTENTIAL
powers.description: [Nano Boost] also grants the target 20% Ultimate Charge and 200 Overhealth.
